definition: to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection

sentences.english: Night gathers, and now my watch begins. It shall not end until my death.
sentences.chinese: 永夜將至，我從今開端守望，至死方休。

sentences.english: The control software has been produced by Thales UK at its Crawley facility.
sentences.chinese: “守望者”無人機控制軟件由泰利斯英國公司開發。

sentences.english: This second trip fairly aroused the watchers along shore.
sentences.chinese: 小划子的第二趟行程可大大驚動了岸上的守望者。

sentences.english: That's all i'd all day . i'd just be the catcher in the rye and all.
sentences.chinese: 我整天就幹那種事，就當個麥田裏的守望者得了。

sentences.english: And the young man that kept the watch lifted up his eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came much people by the way of the hill side behind him.
sentences.chinese: 守望的少年人舉目觀看，見有許多人從山坡的路上來。

sentences.english: He calleth to me out of Seir, Watchman, what of the night?
sentences.chinese: 有人聲從西珥呼問我，說，守望的阿，夜裏如何。

sentences.english: Shouwang church is a house church in Haidian district, Beijing. Wang Jing / China Daily
sentences.chinese: 守望教會是北京海淀區的一個家庭教會。

sentences.english: The two peoples have the tradition of helping and supporting each other.
sentences.chinese: 中智兩國人民素有守望相助的傳統。

sentences.english: Xiaobing automation industry to do the Rye.
sentences.chinese: 小兵做自動化行業的守望者。

sentences.english: The gang ran off and left their lookout as a fall guy.
sentences.chinese: 那夥人逃跑了，讓他們的守望員當了替罪羊。

sentences.english: Also I set watchmen over you, saying, Hearken to the sound of the trumpet.
sentences.chinese: 我設立守望的人照管你們，說，要聽角聲。

sentences.english: On the bustling life in the home, as a glory to watch.
sentences.chinese: 置生活於繁華之上，讓榮耀成爲一種守望。

sentences.english: Participants helped each other to avoid obstacles on the way.
sentences.chinese: 參加者守望相助，互相提點，避免碰到障礙物。

sentences.english: Hope everyone have good time at EOU and love Yoonho deeply with good virtue.
sentences.chinese: 希望您在守望過的開心愉快，愛的深刻氣質。

sentences.english: Fourth, , we should remain committed to mutual assistance in security.
sentences.chinese: 第四，堅持安全上守望相助。

sentences.english: At least the first Watchmen film was meant to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 至少電影《守望者》的第一部是註定要上映的。

definition: the other end of the world/a faraway place
to wait for/to expect/to keep watch/to watch over/to nurse
to remain silent/to have nothing to say
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
from dawn to dusk/all the time
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
